caption: A metro train in the city of Spijkenisse, in the Netherlands, rests precariously on an art installation of a whale after crashing through a barrier at the end of the tracks.

result.explanation: This assessment is knowledge-based. The plausibility is low due to the unusual nature of the event. News reports of such incidents would likely be widely circulated given the dramatic nature of a train crashing onto an art installation.  The lack of any corroborating news reports makes the caption's accuracy questionable. There are no specific details like dates or names of those involved to further assess the claim.
